title: Yishan Vegetarian
description: Name 益膳素食坊, address 金牛区茶店子育苗路2号4单元1楼(近第四幼儿园). Relaxing atmosphere. Could play mah-jong here. Prices increased to moderate. Note: it's difficult to find as there is no English or pinying to indicate the location inside a residential community. Go in at the address to the end and left to the end and in to the residential door on the 1st floor left. Knock if closed.
streetAddress: 1F, Block 4, 2 Yumiao Rd, Chadianzi, Jinniu District
